templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient is ACTION and the SPECIFIC ACTION_DETAIL QUALIFIER DETAIL_VALUE

statements.statement:
select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "*ANY ACTION" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Admitted" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Person Combined" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Person Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Discharged" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Transfered" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Any patient event" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Current admit date defined, previous admit date is not defined" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Current and previous encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Current and previous person id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Current and previous person & encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Current discharged date is defined but previous discharge date is not" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Current and previous location codes differ" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 7)
order by action

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "current" elseif (d.seq = 2) "previous" elseif (d.seq = 3) "current or previous" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Current or new admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Previous admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Check before and after values" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 3)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "is" elseif (d.seq = 2) "is not" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1)
from (dummyt d with seq = 2)
order by d.seq

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_PARENT_CHILD_L
templateDefinitions.definition: CONTINUING_TYPE PARENT_CHILD orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_NEW
templateDefinitions.definition: Order PROCEDURE PRIORITY and bill code CODE with CHART order comment COMMENT

statements.statement: select ocs.mnemonic,catalog_type=cv.display from order_catalog oc, order_catalog_synonym ocs, code_value cv plan oc where oc.orderable_type_flag not in (2,3,6,8,11) and oc.active_ind = 1 and oc.catalog_type_cd > 0 join cv where cv.code_value = oc.catalog_type_cd and cv.cdf_meaning != "PHARMACY " join ocs where ocs.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and ocs.mnemonic = oc.primary_mnemonic order cnvtupper(ocs.mnemonic)
SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY,C1.DESCRIPTION,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 2054 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 13028 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_VALUE or inherit it from OPT_LINK for orders setup by GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already set
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

value.value: System generated due to documentation of Medical History: Seizures Hx-Ketogenic Diet
System generated due to documentation of Medical History: Seizures Hx-Ketogenic Diet
